AUTHOR: sedruk#7348, Injabie3#1660
INSTALL_MSG: The word_filter module was installed. Run [p]wf to see the commands.
NAME: WordFilter
SHORT: A word filter cog, for all your word filtering needs.
DESCRIPTION: A powerful word filter cog that uses regex to filter out messages, and tells people that they are filtered.  Also replaces the message with asterisks in place of filtered out words.
